tool_description: Generate candlestick, line, bar chart images for stocks. API by finchartist.com.
name: Financial Chart Images API
title: Financial Chart Images API

api_list.name: get_supported_exchanges_exchanges_get
api_list.description: Fetches a list of supported exchanges using the Twelve Data API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-chart-images-api1.p.rapidapi.com/exchanges"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-chart-images-api1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: get_stocks_on_exchange_stocks__exchange__get
api_list.description: Fetches a list of all stocks available on the specified exchange using the Twelve Data API.

required_parameters.name: exchange
required_parameters.description: The exchange to fetch stocks from

api_list.name: generate_chart_get
api_list.description:
Generates a stock chart for a given symbol and exchange.

This endpoint fetches stock data for the specified symbol from the given exchange and generates a chart based on the specified parameters. The chart can be customized with various options such as interval, chart type, and appearance settings.

The resulting chart is returned as an HTML image element embedded with the base64-encoded chart image.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: Stock symbol to fetch data for

optional_parameters.name: outputsize
optional_parameters.description: Number of data points to return

optional_parameters.name: dark_mode
optional_parameters.description: Whether to use dark mode for the chart

optional_parameters.name: volume
optional_parameters.description: Whether to include volume in the chart

optional_parameters.name: grid
optional_parameters.description: Whether to display grid on the chart

optional_parameters.name: interval
optional_parameters.description: Time interval for the stock data
